inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addSkillBonus('Hide', 'Stackable', 10); effect.getBonuses().addSkillBonus('Search', 'Stackable', 10); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Sneaky
description: You are especially good at sneaking and spoting anyone else trying to be sneaky.  You gain a +10 bonus to Hide and Search checks.
